name: Zillow
description: Largest real estate marketplace with listings, Zestimates, and home buying tools

name: Redfin
description: Technology-powered real estate brokerage with lower fees and online home buying tools

name: Realtor.com
description: Official real estate listings site operated by the National Association of Realtors

name: Trulia
description: Real estate search platform with neighborhood insights, crime maps, and school ratings

name: Compass
description: Tech-driven real estate brokerage with AI tools for agents and luxury listings

name: Opendoor
description: iBuyer platform that makes instant cash offers to buy and sell homes online

name: Offerpad
description: Real estate technology company offering instant home sale offers and flexible closing

name: Wayfair
description: E-commerce giant for furniture, home decor, and housewares with millions of products

name: IKEA
description: Swedish furniture retailer known for affordable, flat-pack, modern home furnishings

name: West Elm
description: Modern furniture and home decor brand with mid-century and contemporary designs

name: Houzz
description: Home design and renovation platform connecting homeowners with professionals and products

name: HomeAdvisor
description: Platform connecting homeowners with pre-screened local home service professionals

name: Angi
description: Home services marketplace for finding and booking local contractors and handymen

name: TaskRabbit
description: On-demand platform for hiring local taskers for furniture assembly, moving, and odd jobs

name: Thumbtack
description: Local services marketplace matching homeowners with pros for any home project

name: Article
description: Direct-to-consumer modern furniture brand with mid-century and Scandinavian designs

name: Castlery
description: Online furniture brand offering designer-quality pieces at accessible price points

name: Crate & Barrel
description: Home furnishings retailer with contemporary furniture, housewares, and wedding registry

name: Pottery Barn
description: Premium home furnishings brand with classic American style furniture and decor

name: CB2
description: Modern furniture brand from Crate & Barrel targeting younger urban consumers
